use_cases_desc:
Affinity diagramming used in ideation and creative design

Hotel browser: used as research prototype in another study (FacetSearch)

Movie browser to allow exploration of movie collections
contribution_desc: Design guidelines for distributed user interfaces. The design guidelines are implemented in ZOIL, a software framework for the development of zoomable object-oriented information landscapes.
use_cases: Hotel browser; Interactive TV; Library catalogue search; Movie search
interaction_techniques: UI distribution; Visualisation; Data exploration; Remote control
contribution: Toolkit, middleware; Design guidelines for DUI
